definitions: a European thrush with mainly black plumage.

notes.text: Genus Turdus, subfamily Turdinae, family Muscicapidae: four species, in particular T. merula, the male of which has all-black plumage and a yellow bill

shortDefinitions: Old World thrush with mainly black plumage

definitions: an American bird with a strong pointed bill. The male has black plumage that is iridescent or has patches of red or yellow.

notes.text: Family Icteridae: several genera and species, including the abundant red-winged blackbird (Agelaius phoeniceus)

shortDefinitions: New World songbird with strong pointed bill
